setGoal.title: Welcome to the YOUPERS personal Stress-Management Campaign
setGoal.text:
Improve your work life balance through sustainable behavioral change.

Congratulations: the first step is already done!

Technical review

We review our technical content - the questionnaire, the activities and proposals.

  • Feedback on the questionnaire is collected in Excel.
  • Corrections / feedback on the activities can be entered directly, via the admin button on the website.

Start: Wednesday 20th Novemeber

End: Monday, December 25
